imdb.plot outline: Is your vacation personality anything like the real you? Zhang Hao (Nichkhun from 2PM) is a Chinese-American who goes on a vacation to Greece to escape pressure from his family to marry. He met his 1st love there. Wanting to meet her again, he enrolled at a college in China, but the one he met there was a different girl with the same name, Luo Man (Lulu Xu), a rowdy girl unlike his elegant 1st love. Zhang Hao also strikes a friendship with Li Xiuqi (Jinfu Jiang), Luo Man's childhood friend with a longtime crush on her.
imdb.title: One and a Half Summer
plot: Is your vacation personality anything like the real you? Zhang Hao (Nichkhun from 2PM) is a Chinese-American who goes on a vacation to Greece to escape pressures from his family back home to marry.

Is your vacation personality anything like the real you? Zhang Hao (Nichkhun from 2PM) is a Chinese-American who goes on a vacation to Greece to escape pressure from his family to marry. He met his 1st love there. Wanting to meet her again, he enrolled at a college in China, but the one he met there was a different girl with the same name, Luo Man (Lulu Xu), a rowdy girl unlike his elegant 1st love. Zhang Hao also strikes a friendship with Li Xiuqi (Jinfu Jiang), Luo Man's childhood friend with a longtime crush on her.
